description: Classes under this number offer a more in-depth look at historical eras and topics or repertoiries associated with a specific period of music history. Classes will either focus on one historical epoch (Enlightenment, Romantic, Modernism). The purpose of this course is to give students the opportunity to engage deeply with musical objects, both historically and analytically, as well as to expose them to a range of methodologies with which to study music. (Formerly 123, 124).
name: ERAS & TPCS: LTR PERIODS: 20th CENTURY REPERTOIRES
